snippet.title: Fallen Knight Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Take the role of an elite knight and battle your way through action-packed levels with intense sword fighting gameplay in this neo-classic side scrolling action platformer. Save the city from a deadly terrorist organisation hell-bent on exposing the truth you were sworn to protect.

See more: https://pqube.co.uk/fallen-knight/
Wishlist on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1378370/Fallen_Knight/

Follow PQube Games on social media!
Discord: https://discord.gg/pqubegames 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pqubegames/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PQubeGames 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pqubegames/
